name: Proxima Centari
description:
Update released 9/5/2021:  Build Notes

  • improved animations when enemies are hit. Returned the enemies dissolve animation on death. 
  • Enemies have been approved by flight control to now fly in one of 6 flight patterns to improve randomness
  • Difficulty selection now impacts time between enemies spawning in waves instead of just time between waves. 
  • Waves now only end when all enemies in the wave are destroyed
  • Main boss now has a bigger shield and no longer spins like mad until phase 3. 
  • Added sweet new branding :-)

Life is a remnant from the dawn of time.  A being of pure energy that has flown through space for billions of years. Until one day, in the deepest recesses of space Life encounters explorers from Earth and must defend himself against their attacks. The game may contain bugs and balance issues in the current state. 

Controls: 

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Shoot
  • Collect Power-up drops from enemy captains (larger enemies) to improve weapons, life and score!

Collect power-ups to charge your plasma and increase your weapon power. 

Difficulty Options:

  • Easy:  4 Seconds between wave. 3  seconds between each new enemy 
  • Normal:  3 Seconds between wave. 2  seconds between each new enemy 
  • Hard: 2 Seconds between wave. 1  seconds between each new enemy 

For the best experience download the Standalone Windows build below!
